articles.content: When you're going around and around on a carnival ride, you feel it — you're pulled outward, and all you can do is hang on. Our planet is rotating much faster than that, so why aren't we all holding … [+2432 chars]

articles.title: Artistic expression in humans may have evolved much earlier than initially thought - WION
articles.description: Artistic expression in humans may have evolved much earlier than initially thought
articles.content: It is often thought that artistic expression developed as humans evolved into their modern form, that is, Homo Sapiens. But this assumption has had faced challenges in recent years. The 'Unicorn cave… [+1743 chars]

articles.title: Galactic Surprise: Milky Way's Slower Outer Stars Suggest Dark Matter Overestimated - SciTechDaily
articles.description: MIT's study shows outer Milky Way stars rotate slower, indicating a lighter core with less dark matter, contradicting previous assumptions. By clocking the speed of stars throughout the Milky Way galaxy, MIT physicists have found that stars further out in the…
articles.content: New research by MIT reveals that stars at the edge of the Milky Way move slower than anticipated, implying the galaxy’s core may contain less dark matter, challenging current astronomical theories. C… [+7498 chars]
